Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.fastdom

The classes in this package implement a lightweight DOM that is faster to build and serialize than the standard XML DOM.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeFastParent Defines the interface for nodes that can be parents of other nodes.
IAeVisitable Defines the interface for objects that can be visited by IAeVisitor.
IAeVisitor Defines the interface for objects that can visit nodes in the fast, lightweight DOM.
 

Class Summary
AeDocumentBuilder Builds a standard XML Document from an AeFastDocument.
AeFastAttribute Implements an element attribute in the fast, lightweight DOM.
AeFastDocument Implements a document in the fast, lightweight DOM.
AeFastElement Implements an element node in the fast, lightweight DOM.
AeFastNode Abstract base class for nodes in the fast, lightweight DOM.
AeFastText Implements a text node in the fast, lightweight DOM.
AeForeignNode Implements a reference to an external XML Node.
AeXMLFormatter Formats an AeFastNode object to an XML stream.
AeXMLFormatter.AeIndentingWriter Wraps another Writer with methods to write new lines with indenting white space at the beginning of each new line.
 

Exception Summary
AeIllegalAddException Implements the exception that reports violations when adding a node to the fast, lightweight DOM.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.fastdom Description

The classes in this package implement a lightweight DOM that is faster to build and serialize than the standard XML DOM. This is used to improve the performance of persistence.

Note: The methods in this package's classes are generally not thread-safe.
